message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It holds significant value to us, but considering its potential to bring immense benefits to you, we are offering it for a special introductory price of $950000. We believe this is an exceptional opportunity for both parties, and we look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product holds for me. I'm excited about the potential benefits it can bring, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
